snippet: A NATO soldier was killed on Tuesday in southern Afghanistan when a man wearing an Afghan Army uniform turned his gun on him.

byline.contributor: Taimoor Shah contributed reporting from Kandahar.

lead_paragraph: A NATO soldier was killed on Tuesday in southern Afghanistan when a man wearing an Afghan Army uniform turned his gun on him.

headline.seo: Man Dressed as Afghan Soldier Kills NATO Service Member
headline.main: Man Dressed as Afghan Soldier Kills NATO Service Member
headline.print_headline: Man Dressed as Afghan Soldier Kills NATO Service Member
